author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

- This allows all the values in ROOT::RNTupleWriteOptions to be set from the configuration.

#### PR validation:

Tested using workflow  2500.2601 and with the proper values for noSplitFields, maxUnzippedPageSize and pageBufferBudget, I was able to shrink the file size compared to TTree by an additional 3%.
title: Add rntupleWriteOptions param to NanoAODRNtupleOutputModule
